author: world today news
title: Italy: Handbook trial towards a member of the 5 Stars within the parliament by his colleague from the League (Video) – 2024-06-13 17:59:05
text:
Nice stress, with the usage of violence, occurred late this afternoon within the Parliament of Rome. 5 Star MP Leonardo Dono tried at hand over an Italian flag to Italy’s regional affairs minister Roberto Calderoli in protest towards a reform that will increase the areas’ fiscal and legislative autonomy.
Earlier than reaching the seats of presidency, Dono was surrounded by deputies who, based on witnesses, belonged to the League occasion. “On the expense of the colleague of the 5 Stars, the deputy of the League, Igor Yeci, has raised his hand,” mentioned the secretary of the Italian Left, Nicola Fratogianni, who was within the room.
Brawl within the Chamber, the M5s deputy Donno is hit and falls, instantly afterwards they take him away in a wheelchair. The episode within the Chamber throughout the dialogue on differentiated autonomy. #ANSA pic.twitter.com/sGJc8SRSmq
— ANSA Company (@Agenzia_Ansa) June 12, 2024
Talking in a phone reference to the TV channel La7, Leonardo Dono mentioned some time in the past that “somebody hit him violently within the chest and he felt himself shedding consciousness”. “I am within the emergency room of the Santo Spirito hospital, fortunately I am feeling just a little higher,” the MP added. He made it clear that he’s going to file a lawsuit towards anybody accountable.
“Palms off our flag and ourselves. It is a disgrace, it will not occur to you,” emphasised 5 Star captain Giuseppe Conte. The secretary of the center-left Democratic Occasion, Ellie Sline, additionally expressed her assist for the “five-star” member of parliament, who condemned “the ever-increasing, verbal and even bodily violence.”
